alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Iberville; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:53PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Ascension, southeastern Iberville and northwestern Assumption Parishes through 430 PM CDT... At 352 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bayou Sorrel, or 8 miles southwest of Plaquemine, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Gabriel, White Castle, Bayou Sorrel and Belle Rose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana.
